targets.query: SELECT last("air_temp_high") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "weatherflow_forecast_daily" WHERE ("station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$tz')
SELECT last("air_temp_high") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "weatherflow_forecast_daily" WHERE ("station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('$tz')

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "station_time_zone" WHERE "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/
